column1: #Text=George Waldeaux took his mother and boy back to the old homestead in Delaware .
#Text=They arrived at night , and early the next morning he rowed away in his bateau to some of his old haunts in the woods on the bay , and was seen no more that day .

column1: #Text=Publishers thanked him effusively for the pleasure of reading them , and -- sent them back .
#Text=The only word of his which reached the public was a review of the work of a successful author .
#Text=It was so personal , so malignant , that George , when he read it , writhed with shame and humiliation .
#Text=" Am I so envious and small as that !
